1.SceneDescription: The Hallway, Phoebe walks up to and knocks on Chandler and Monica’s door.

lines.Line:
(opens the door wearing a robe, but leaves the chain on) Hey,
what’s up
Well, I left my guitar here again
Okay. (Monica closes the door, gets the guitar, and then hands it out.
Great! Umm…(Monica closes the door again and Phoebe knocks again.
So do you want to hang out or something
Phoebe! You kinda caught me at a bad time
Okay. Do you guys want me to play for you
(laughs) No. (Closes the door as Chandler walks up.
You ask an intriguing question Chandler Bing

lines.Character:
(Chandler lets her into the apartment and reveals that Monica is getting a massage from
another woman
lines.Line:
Chandler lets her into the apartment and reveals that Monica is getting a massage from
another woman.
Oh my God! You’re getting a massage! You never let me massage you!
Oh my God! You’re getting a massage! You never let me massage you!
You told me you hate massages
You told me you hate massages
Buy stamps, pick up dry cleaning…Don’t let Phoebe in
I can’t believe this! How long as this been going on

Okay—Oop! Too late! I’m leaving! Come on Chandler let’s
go! (She storms out.

Well, Phoebe I thought I’d—(Off Phoebe’s
look)—Yeah, what the hell. (Exits with Phoebe.

2.SceneDescription:
Monica and Chandler's, Monica has opened another wedding present as Chandler
enters.

lines.Line:
Hi honey. We just got a wedding gift from Bob and Faye Bing; they
don’t like us do they? (They gave them a pok-a-dotted punch bowl.

Who says you can’t get a nice punch bowl for under six bucks?
Maybe we can take it back
No, it doesn’t say where it came from. Where would we return it
How about to the street say from the balcony
How about to the street say from the balcony
Why don’t we just find a place for it
Why don’t we just find a place for it
Okay. How about in that cabinet

No! That’s where we keep the canned goods! Have you completely
forgotten everything you learned at orientation

How about the closet by the bathroom? (The secret green door by the
bathroom.
Oh, okay. Here, why don’t you let me do it
Oh, okay. Here, why don’t you let me do it

Oh no-no-no, I will do it. Honey, you have to learn to sit down and
relax and let your husband take care of things once and awhile. (Tries the door.)
It’s locked, you have to help me. Why is it locked
No reason. I-I keep private things in there
No reason. I-I keep private things in there

Oh y’know, I’ve been living here a while and I’ve never
seen what’s inside that closet. What is, what is in there
Don’t try to make me uncomfortable with feminine stuff

Chandler, there is nothing in there that concerns you! If you love me
you-you’ll let it go
Thank you! (He tries the door again and Monica glares at him.
(entering) Hello Chandler, lovely day huh? (To Monica) You

Phoebe if it helps Alexandra has only been massaging Monica for like
three years. (Phoebe rolls her eyes and walks away and Monica glares at him.) If! I said,
"If it helps!" (Goes to the bedroom.
Why won’t you let me massage you
Why won’t you let me massage you

Well it’s…I mean I’d just—I’d be
self-conscious. You’re my friend; I’d be naked
Monica! We lived together for years! I’ve seen you naked
Monica! We lived together for years! I’ve seen you naked
That’s different, we were roommates! And when?
I’m curious about the human body
Hey, come on Phoebe, you can understand why this would be weird for me

But I’m a professional! And I’m really good! Look, if
you’re uncomfortable we can stop. Just give me a chance, okay. Please
Okay, if it means that much to you
Okay, if it means that much to you
Okay, if it means that much to you

It does! How would you feel if you couldn’t share your cooking?
Or-or imagine how Ross would feel if he couldn’t teach us about dragons

3.SceneDescription: Phoebe's Apartment, Monica is lying on the massage table waiting for Phoebe.

lines.Line: (calling from her room) Are you under the sheet

lines.Character: (Phoebe turns on some music and grabs some oil
lines.Line: Phoebe turns on some music and grabs some oil.

(in a soothing voice) Great, let’s begin. (She starts the massage.)
How’s the pressure
Nice! Wow Phoebe you are good
Nice! Wow Phoebe you are good
Stating the obvious, but thank you. And it’s not weird is it
(in a sexy voice) Oh. Oh yeah! Ohhhhh! Ohh! Oh yeah!

Oh God Phoebe!! (Phoebe covers one ear.) Oh that’s it! That’s
it! Right there! Oh! (Tries to cover the other ear.) Ooooh-oooh-ooooh… (Covers both
ears and continues the massage with her elbows.

4.SceneDescription:
The Hospital, Joey is in the waiting room as Rachel comes back out with the
doctor.

lines.Line:
She’s fine. She’s experiencing Braxton-Hicks contractions,
mild discomfort caused by contractions in the uterine wall

Hmm, mild discomfort. So I take it you’ve had one of these Braxton
thingies
And-and there’s no danger to her and the baby

No-no. Contractions can be unnerving if you don’t know what they
are, but she’s fine

Thank you doctor. (Dr. Long exits.) (To Joey) Oh thank you for being so
nice and calm

Calm?! I wasn’t calm! I’ve never been more scared in all my
life

Calm?! I wasn’t calm! I’ve never been more scared in all my
life
But wait you said everything was gonna be okay
Well what do I know?! I’m not a doctor
Well what do I know?! I’m not a doctor
But I—But everything is okay. I’m fine

Yes! Yes! I got half a mind to contract that doctor’s uterus
though. Mild discomfort, what’s he talking about
Your page said come to the hospital, what? What was it? What happened
Oh. Oh. Thank God, most women don’t even feel them
Hey uh, what’s with the candy

Oh when you beeped me I was on line at the concession stand at the movie
theater
Oh you went to the movies by yourself
Oh you went to the movies by yourself
Oh, I gotta go back in there
No, everything’s fine. I just gotta go back
No really, you tell me what’s up
No really, you tell me what’s up
I-I forgot my underwear. (Ross lets her go.
(To Joey) So, thanks so much for bringing her to the hospital

Oh hey, don’t worry about it man. Don’t worry about it, no big
deal

Oh hey, don’t worry about it man. Don’t worry about it, no big
deal
Yeah but still, I mean it should’ve been me. I’m the dad

(To Joey) Uh, if you have any questions, here’s some information
on Braxton-Hicks. (Hands Joey a pamphlet.) Oh and by the way, you did the right thing by
bringing her in. You’re gonna make a wonderful father
Oh uh, hey. Not as good as this guy! (Grabs Ross around the shoulders.) He brought Twizlers

5.SceneDescription: Central Perk, Phoebe is on the couch as Monica enters.

lines.Line: I gotta tell you, yesterday was amazing. That massage felt so good
So umm, what do you say we make it a weekly appointment

Okay. Okay but you should know though, I’ve raised my rates to $200
an hour
Oh, you make sex noises when you get massaged

Yeah, and it really freaked me out! And after a while I even tried to
hurt you and it just spurred you on

What?! You’re crazy! There’s nothing sexual about the noises I
make

Really? There’s nothing sexual about this? (Sexily) Oooh. Oo God!
Ohh. Ohhhh. Ohh. (Some cute guy is watching closely.) (To him) What are you looking at?!
(Pause) I mean hi

Oh my—This is so embarrassing. Oh my God, I’m never gonna get
massaged again

Oh my—This is so embarrassing. Oh my God, I’m never gonna get
massaged again

No, you can’t let this stop you from getting massages! No look, I
have, I have lots of clients that make the same noises you do

Well not clients, lovers. But let’s just y’know, try it again.
Come back and-and we’ll work through it

Great! Okay, if you’ll just excuse me. (To the guy) So, did you
hear something you liked

6.SceneDescription:
Monica and Chandler's, Chandler is pounding out the hinge pins on the closet
door to get it open.

lines.Line:
Not to shabby, I got this all off myself…using my wife’s
tools. (He takes the door off the frame and we finally get to see what’s behind the
green door! It is stacked, floor to ceiling, with junk.) Oh my God
(entering) (Gasps) How did you get in there?
Oh no! You weren’t supposed to see this
No Chandler, you don’t understand! (Chandler starts singing the theme for Sanford and Son, an old TV show starring Redd Fox.) Okay! Okay! Okay! Fine! Now you know. Okay? I’m y’know…I’m sick

No, honey you’re not sick! Look, I don’t love you because
you’re organized, I love you in spite of that
Really? You promise you won’t tell anyone
Really? You promise you won’t tell anyone

Yes! And look, now that I know if I got some extra stuff lying around
can we, can we share the closet
Well…it’s just umm…I’m afraid you might mess it up
Well…it’s just umm…I’m afraid you might mess it up

7.SceneDescription: Phoebe's Apartment, Phoebe is giving Monica another massage.

lines.Line: Yeah, you like that don’t you
You want it there? You take it there baby

Yeah, say my name. Say it! (She stops when she realizes what she’s
doing.) And now I’m going to cover you back up, and umm we’re never doing this
again
